text: HEYO

name: vweep
text: Depends on how black you want it; putrefaction does not go over well with most women.

name: carlyle
text: Ask that Alice story in 7Chan.

name: tapaidhnaomh
text: I asked a female friend of mine. According to her a whiter penis does not give you any sort of leg-up in the business.

name: norrin
text: Have they seen the results of Steve Martin's All Natural Penis Cream, Formula 2?

name: jlynes
text: And now, no more scaling.

name: i_love_kate
text: Yeah, I prefer the alt text to the strip in this one.

name: caitskills
text: that is why i gave this a 5. alt-text and alt-text alone.

name: andrew_
text: NYMPHO PEE PEE TEENS

name: joeyramoney
text: i love that it looks like your avatar is shouting that.

name: fielding
text: I love that it looks like your avatar is calmly speaking that.

name: andrew_
text: it's one of the perks of the avatar.

name: semiquaver
text:
*smirks*

As per his own avatar.

name: soticoto
text: And your avatar never ceases to disturb me.

name: semiquaver
text:
Yours makes me cry.

Even though I know that WCCs are fireproofed, and that the furnace is part of the tube system, and you can dump your WCC in the furnace and run back to the start of the level and see it, or something.

name: soticoto
text:
O_O;

X-Box 360 version no have No Clip Mode!
No fair!
;_;

name: semiquaver
text: You can see that the the tube system from the inside on the last level.  And you can apparently beat the WCC back to the start of the level based on a video i saw on youtube.

name: soticoto
text:
You have fundamentally ripped a hole in the fabric of my existence...
I suppose that warrants chubb.

name: anzio
text: Really, it's just nice to know the companion cube was never in any real danger. That would have been just awful.

name: soticoto
text:
Well... not really.
I suppose at some level it proves that I was never really loved. Cast aside so easily to open a door. Is it even worth existing past that?
Perhaps it would be better to be incinerated.

name: scraggg
text: Here's my card.

text: It's an icon.

text: This is exactly how I feel after I hit the "mark as spam" button immediately when the message loads.

text:
Beef!

text: Fucking hell , University of Phoenix sends me e-mails all the dang time. I did not realise this was a Thing.

name: sixtyswine
text: This strip gets a five for penis whitening.

name: wonelove
text:
Beef is not a materialistic cat EXCEPT when it comes to high-tech gadgetry.
He had his Cyberhelmet custom-made for him by Mercedez-Benz.

name: plummet
text:
The strip that fails to get less funny every time I read it

In fact it increases exponentially in humor at each reading
